Server.Name: Winter Project 2019
Server.Description:
Welcome to the Winter Project 2019 by sphereii and xyth
After many delays, the Winter Project 2019 arrived just in time to be fashionably late.
Enter in our cold and unforgiving world buried under a snow apocalypse. Find new challenges as you explore the desolate icy wasteland.
The following Pre-generated worlds are provided for faster loads:
Winter Project 4K Winter Project 6K Winter Project 8K
Navezgane and Random Gen should generate correctly now.
Thank you to the following Modlet creators who helped shape out the world with their modlets: Donovan's Better Bridges, Better Spears, Craft Jail and Craft Spikes modlets. TormentedEmu's GUI Manager for Localization support for A18.2 JaxTeller718 for his Charcola, Eggs in Fridges, More Feathers, Working Stoves and Zombie Hand Adjustments Mean Cloud's Scrap Bone Knives Atlas' More Vanilla Food Oignon's Vehicles Pack, Sittable Furniture bdubyah's Rebar Club, and Wasteland Weapons Stallionsden's Lootable Objects, Store Shelves, and his prots of Valmar's Expanded ammo types and cooking bowls War2zuk's Disassemble Ammo
Special thanks goes to Mumpfy for his texturing work.
